about_the_game:
Right now! reshape the world

  • Rise of the Underdog King is a text-based adventure game inspired by Wish-fulfillment fiction and webisode. Get ready for discover a new world and epic slap battle. After a fateful encounter on a flight, you gain a unique power that lets you reshape the world. Your comeback story starts now!

  • Tired of spoiled rich kids, tyrannical bosses, or obnoxious coworkers? No need for overthinking or tough choices here—when enough is enough, let your palm do the talking. One slap, and everything changes!

  • But this newfound power comes with a price, . You‘ll find yourself caught up in a wild conspiracy, where every slap could shake up more than just your life—it might even change the world! Along the way, you’ll meet allies, face dilemmas, and dive into tangled relationships. Stick to one love interest or go for them all? The choice is yours.

One slap, you will know who's your "daddy"

  • It’s not just about your own comeback story—why not share the fun with friends? in the "Friend against bad company" mod of Rise of the Underdog king, you and your friends can pick your favorite characters and jump into a fast paced, hilarious slap battle. Let's the smack show begin!

ATTENTION！Time for create your own Storyline

  • We’ve designed an easy-to-use mod creation system that requires no programming skills! With just a small learning curve, you can create your own thrilling, slap-filled stories and share them with other players in the Creative Workshop.

  • But that’s not all—after the game’s launch, we’ll be offering rewards based on the download and rating rankings in the Workshop. Don’t miss your chance to showcase your creativity and win big!

  • Join us and share your unique stories with the community. For more details, feel free to join our QQ group: 941063734!
